string.text: I would like to buy something.
Sorry, I do not have that much money.
How did you get to the Mercenaries?
How did you get to the Mercenaries?

Well, as you can see turned out to be. I was going on the Radar and I was able to negotiate with one group of mercenaries on sovmestnoi outing, as I'm a man was known and experienced, they came in contact. As it turned out, the Mercenaries attacked Dolgovtsev and asked me to help, I agreed. We joined the squad, the Tyrant and acted together.
Yes. Together we helps the detachment of the Tyrant RAID Dolgovtsev going to the Base of Mercenaries. After that and joined the Syndicate.
